DISTRICT OFFICE:

Denver, Colorado
Telephone: 303-233-3611
August 11, 1967
National Association of
Educational Broadcasters
1346 Connecticut Avenue, N. W.
Washington, D. C.
Gentlemen:
Enclosed please find a copy of House Recording Studio
Invoice No. 9905 in the amount of $58.00.
This invoice represents charges for the shooting of a
colored film by Congressman Donald G. Brotzman for KRMA-TV in
Denver. The interview was requested by Mr. Bill Greenwood, who
indicated that your Association would reimburse"the Congressman
for these charges.
You may make your check payable to Congressman Donald G.
Brotzman, who in turn, will endorse it over to the Recording
Studio.
Thank you for your attention. It was a pleasure working
with you.
RLT:ps
